author: James Tanner
method: Place a small saucepan over a medium heat. Add the frozen winter fruit, the stem ginger, and the mixed spice. Bring to the simmer and cook for five minutes. To serve, pour into a bowl and drizzle with double cream.
ingredients: 400g frozen winter fruits,  50g/1¾oz stem ginger, cut into julienne,  2 pinches ground mixed spice,  50ml/2fl oz double cream
